availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Married to Amelia M. Hampton Hawes in Boyd County, Kentucky on October 21, 1863. Served in the 14th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Second Lieutenant from June 13, 1862 to. Served in the 45th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Second Lieutenant from September 25, 1863 to September 25, 1863, mustered out the same day he was mustered in, listed as a supernumerary officer.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Boyd County Marriages, Film #000344011, p. 586 of microfilm.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 274.
